Title: Authorizes businesses to designate work performed remotely due to the outbreak of COVID-19 to have been performed at its normal work location for state and local tax purposes
Summary: Authorizes businesses to designate work performed remotely due to the outbreak of COVID-19 to have been performed at its normal work location for state and local tax purposes for the duration of the state disaster emergency declared pursuant to executive order 202 of 2020.
ActClause: AN ACT authorizing businesses to designate work performed remotely due to the outbreak of novel coronavirus, COVID-19 to have been performed at its normal work location for state and local tax purposes
